items.title: 3 Artificial Intelligence Stocks to Buy Like There's No Tomorrow
items.author: Geoffrey Seiler
items.description: The article discusses three AI stocks that are well-positioned to benefit from the growing demand for AI infrastructure and services: Nvidia, Alphabet, and Salesforce. It highlights the companies' strengths and growth opportunities in the AI space.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Nvidia is the leading provider of GPUs for AI infrastructure, and its market share and technology leadership are expected to continue driving growth as AI spending increases.
Alphabet's Google Cloud is benefiting from growing AI demand, and the company is developing its own AI chips and models to improve its offerings and monetization opportunities.
Alphabet's Google Cloud is benefiting from growing AI demand, and the company is developing its own AI chips and models to improve its offerings and monetization opportunities.
Salesforce is positioning itself as a leader in the emerging agentic AI market with its Agentforce solution, which has seen strong early demand from customers.
